divs: Sighting DetailsI, Lunnie Smith, heard a very weird constant loud noise at 12midnight for about5 minutes. I was over my girlfriends apartment in Marietta about 5-10miles fromLockheed and Dobbins Airforce Base. Many dogs in the neighborhood barked. Itwas a clear full moon night. Very strange. What was it??? THANKS
